page.title: 15A visit to the Station.
page.content: On 20.5.85 an R.A.F.bus took us around the station.From the Visual Control Room of the{Air Traffic Control Tower, we saw two Jaguars & three Dominies landing,& a Wessex helicopter taking off.In the Radar Control Room it was dark so that the screens can be seen. Then we went to{Search & Rescue Wing, & saw the Wessex & Sea King helicopters.These rescue people in difficulty.The Wessex can carry 16 people.It has a winch which is 300ft. The Sea King has a crew of 4 & can carry 18 passengers. Next we went to{S.S.F.Scheduled {Servicing Flight}to see some aeroplanes.We climbed on board a Dominie,a Jetstream & a Jet Provost,& looked at the instruments.The planes seemed small inside,especially the Jet Provost.These planes are used to train pilots & navigators.
